name: Special Protractor
description: A protractor is a rectangular, square, circular or semicircular measuring instrument, typically made of transparent plastic or glass, for measuring angles. The plastic body makes this protactor even more LIGHT

name: Vernier Protractor
description: A protractor is a rectangular, square, circular or semicircular measuring instrument, typically made of transparent plastic or glass, for measuring angles. Vernier scales are attached to give more precise readings

name: Ruler
description: A protractor is a rectangular, square, circular or semicircular measuring instrument, typically made of transparent plastic or glass, for measuring angles. This wooden rule is brown in color and high in demand.
